brills commented on pull request #4498: ARROW-5528: [C++] Fixed a bug when Concatenate() arrays with no value buffers.
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4498
 
 
   An empty BinaryArray or a BinaryArray contains only nulls has no value
   buffer.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

fields.summary: Concatenate() crashes when concatenating empty binary arrays.
